org.bencodej

Class BencodableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bencodej.BencodableObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BencodableByteString, BencodableInteger, BencodableList, BencodeableDictionary

extends java.lang.Object
    Created by bedeho on 10.09.2014.

      • decode

        public static BencodableObject decode(byte[] src)
                               throws DecodingBencodingException
        Decodes bencoding.
        Parameters:
        src - bencoding
        Returns:
        decoded object
        Throws:
        DecodingBencodingException - if bencoding is malformed

      • decode

        public static BencodableObject decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer src)
                               throws DecodingBencodingException
        Decodes bencoding. After successful return the input buffer will have position after end of bencoding. If exception is thrown, the position is set to where last successful read was made.
        Parameters:
        src - bencoding
        Returns:
        decoded object
        Throws:
        DecodingBencodingException - if bencoding is malformed

      • concatenateBencodingsIntoBencoding

        protected static byte[] concatenateBencodingsIntoBencoding(byte startingDelimiter,
                                                           java.util.LinkedList<BencodableObject> bencodableObjectList)
        Bencodes list of objects as specified by paramter. This is a routines for list and dictionary subclasses of this class.
        Parameters:
        startingDelimiter - delimiter, either 'l' or 'd', that should be used in this encoding
        bencodableObjectList - list of bencodable objects
        Returns:
        final bencoding

      • bencode

        public abstract byte[] bencode()
        Bencode this object.
        Returns:
        buffer with bencoding
